caption: Figure 4: Result of Explicit Perceptual Evaluation across three embodied scenarios. Scores in each embodied scenario are normalized to 0-1. The abbreviations are listed in Tab. 2.
description: The radar chart visualizes the performance of eight different video generation models across three embodied scenarios (OE, AD, RM) based on various evaluation dimensions.

caption: Figure 5: Result of Implicit Manipulative Evaluation across three embodied scenarios.The abbreviations are listed in Sec. 4.2.2.
description: The chart displays the performance of different video generation models across various tasks in three embodied scenarios (Open-Ended Embodied Environment, Autonomous Driving, and Robot Manipulation).
